alert.note: Alert for Cuyama Valley; San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Lucia Mountains; Santa Ynez Valley; Southern Salinas Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 02 at 2:04PM PDT until April 03 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 11 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Cuyama Valley, San Luis Obispo County Beaches, San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast, Santa Lucia Mountains, Southern Salinas Valley, San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys, Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches, Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast and Santa Ynez Valley. * WHEN...From 1 PM to 11 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
